metadata.use_case: Common data model for cervical cancer screening data
metadata.description: This is a common data model for cervical cancer screening data to produce key quality performance indicators.

cohort.name: Cervical cancer screening target population
cohort.description:
Population: Screening target-aged women
Intervention: Cervical cancer screening
Outcomes: CanScreen-ECIS indicators

variables.label: sex
variables.description: Sex at the beginning of the screening round

variables.label: screening_year
variables.description: Year of the screening round instance

variables.label: round_specification_id
variables.description: Identifier that specifies the screening programme

variables.label: previous_round_id
variables.description: identifier of the previous screening round

variables.label: screening_previous_attendance
variables.description: Attendance in the previous screening round

variables.label: screening_round_number
variables.description: Ordering number of the current screening round

variables.label: screening_history_string
variables.description: String of form '00100' indicating zeroes for non-attended and ones for attended rounds in the past

variables.label: primary_invitation_type
variables.description: Screening setting, organized population-based or opportunistic

variables.label: screening_round_begin
variables.description: A date, when this screening round is considered to begin (f.ex. invitation date, ...)

variables.label: screening_round_end
variables.description: A date, when this screening round is considered to end (f.ex. beginning of next  round, ...)

variables.label: education
variables.description: Education level,  at the beginning of screening round

variables.label: income
variables.description: Income level,  at the beginning of screening round

variables.label: migration_status
variables.description: Migration status,  at the beginning of screening round

variables.label: employment_status
variables.description: Employment status  at the beginning of screening round

variables.label: disability_status
variables.description: Disability statys  at the beginning of screening round

variables.label: citizenship
variables.description: Citizenship at the beginning of screening round

variables.label: lgbtiqa_status
variables.description: LGBTIQA+status at the beginning of screening round

variables.label: geo_area
variables.description: Geographic location, at the beginning of screening round

variables.label: deprivation_area
variables.description: Deprivation area, at the beginning of screening round

variables.label: preliminary_risk_score
variables.description: Risk score calculated pre-screening round using some external tool

variables.label: preliminary_risk_score_class
variables.description: Risk score classified pre-screening round using some external tool

variables.label: primary_invited
variables.description: Invitation to screening during the round

variables.label: primary_invitation_date
variables.description: Date of invitation for the primary test

variables.label: primary_screening_reason
variables.description: Setting for the primary testing, routine or follow-up

variables.label: primary_test_date
variables.description: Date of attending the primary test

variables.label: primary_test_result_factor
variables.description: Primary test result, possible values depend on the primary test.

variables.label: primary_test_complications
variables.description: Complications related to the primary test

variables.label: triage_test_date
variables.description: Date of attending the triage test

variables.label: triage_test_complications
variables.description: Complications related to the triage test

variables.label: assessment_invited
variables.description: Invitation to assessment (typically referral for colposcopy)

variables.label: assessment_diagnosis
variables.description: Result of the assessment (typically colposcopy confirmation)

variables.label: assessment_complications
variables.description: Complications related to the assessment (typically colposcopy)

variables.label: assessment_phase_cancer_stage
variables.description: If assessment result was cancer, the stage (TNM/FIGO) of cancer at the assessment

variables.label: assessment_phase_stage_type
variables.description: Type of the recorded stage/TNM in the assessment

variables.label: assessment_operations
variables.description: Operations performed at the assessment phase -- note: can be extended to multiple variables

variables.label: interval_cancer_dg_date
variables.description: Date of diagnosis for interval cancer

variables.label: interval_cancer_diagnosis_factor
variables.description: Interval cancer diagnosis, classified to several factors
